properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 11 at 7:01AM CST until January 11 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Eastern Trigg County in western Kentucky...

* Until 730 AM CST.

* At 700 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located over Canton, or 7 miles east of Land Between The Lakes
Area, moving northeast at 45 mph. Another possible tornado was
north of Canton.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Cadiz around 710 AM CST.

This includes Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 58 and
69.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 7:30 AM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
